Our_Terms:
Ratification of the agreement
to be a member of Kashtah and to reserve pools through the application or getting any services through it , you are required to register as a member. By filling in and ratifying the registration form, the user agrees to be bound by the user agreement of Kashtah.

Kashtah reserves the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time without prior notice. You agree that each visit you make to the sites shall be subject to the then-current Terms of Use, and continued use of the site now or following modifications in these Terms of Use confirms that you have read, accepted, and agreed to be bound by such modifications.

General Overview and Description of Service
(a) Kashtah provides an online platform that allows its partners (Pools owners) to advertise their pools for reservation, and allows the users to view these pools and reserve them.
(b) By making a reservation through Kashtah, you are entering into legally binding contractual relationship with the pool owner. You are also agreeing to the cancellation policy provided by the pool owner.
(c) Once a reservation is made, a cancellation email will be sent to the user and the pool owner. It is ultimately the responsibility of the user to ensure that they are present on a timely manner, and the pool's responsibility to provide the access to the pool and the other available facilities.
(d) Although we will use reasonable skill and care in performing our services we will not verify if, and cannot guarantee that, all information is accurate, complete or correct, nor can we held responsible for any errors (including manifest and typographical errors), any interruptions (whether due to any (temporary and/or partial) breakdown, repair, upgrade or maintenance of our website or otherwise), in accurate, misleading or untrue information or non-delivery of information. Each pool owner remains responsible at all times for the accuracy, completeness and correctness of the (descriptive) information (including the rates and availability) displayed on our website.

Indemnity
You agree to indemnify Kashtah against any losses, damages, costs, liabilities and expenses and reasonable attorney fees incurred or suffered by us arising out any breach by you of any provision of these terms and conditions.

Governing Law
These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with Bahrain law. Disputes arising in connection with these Website Terms (including non-contractual disputes) shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Bahrain courts.

Cancellation and No-Show Policy
Kashtah reserves the right to cancel any reservations that might be deemed to be based on inaccurate information provided while registering. Your reservation may be cancelled if we cannot reach you in order to verify from the details provided. By making this reservation you are agreeing to the cancellation and no show policy agreed between Kashtah and the pool owner.

- Failing to adhere to the cancellation time notice above might affect your ability to make future reservations with the pool owner. If the same happens on 3 different reservations, you will not be able to make future reservations using Kashtah.
- You will not be able to make future reservations using Kashtah in case of a no-show. Contact details will be also be forwarded to the pool owner.
- Reservations made through Kashtah cannot be canceled and not refundable, but may find compromise by contact us through the live chat.
- Kashtah is not responsible or liable in any way for reservations made directly with the pool owner. Cancellations for these reservations have to be made by contacting the pool owner. If your reservation needs to be cancelled by the pool owner due to circumstances outside the control of Kashtah. You will be noticed as soon as the pool owner contacts Kashtah.

Disclaimer
To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website (including, without limitation, any warranties implied by law in respect of satisfactory quality, fitness for purpose and/or the use of reasonable care and skill). Nothing in the disclaimer will:
limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury resulting from negligence.
limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation.
limit or exclude our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law.
The limitations and exclusions of liability set out in this section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer or in relation to the subject matter of this disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort (including negligence) and for breach of statutory duty.
